subject: Football (College)
Mascots
Horses
lead_paragraph: Boise State begins home games with Shyann, a mare, and Beth Miller, the Bronco Girl, thundering out to the 50-yard line and energizing the crowd.
snippet: Boise State begins home games with Shyann, a mare, and Beth Miller, the Bronco Girl, thundering out to the 50-yard line and energizing the crowd.
